subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner overwhelmed Gilles Muller in the third set to win, 7-5, 6-7 (3), 6-1, on Saturday and reach the Atlanta Tennis Championships final, where he will face Mardy Fish.
snippet: John Isner overwhelmed Gilles Muller in the third set to win, 7-5, 6-7 (3), 6-1, on Saturday and reach the Atlanta Tennis Championships final, where he will face Mardy Fish.
